name: ITP - Gorge Descent - C1603A - Bored Pile
template name: ITP - Gorge Descent - C1603A - Bored Pile

name: Detail - Contractor to set out grid lines as per contract drawings and specification.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Consistency with Construction Drawing
Detail - Any services in the area are to be clearly marked before any work commence.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey
Conformance Criteria - Service location conducted by asset owner, marked out with dazzle on site.

Detail - On completion of the set out of the wall, the Contractor shall immediately advise the Engineer for the purposes of checking the set out. No other works shall be carried out until this has been checked and approved by the Engineer
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey
Conformance Criteria - If the set out is found to be incorrect, the works shall again be set out by the Contractor and re- checked by the Engineer.
Detail - Timber post spacing and clearance to be in line with the drawing specifications. Set out should allow for clearance, angle and spacing of centres
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection
○ 100mm of clearance on all sides of pile
○ 100mm minimum cover of concrete at base.
Detail - Minimum Pole embedment to be as outlined in specifications
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Pole minimum embedment to be be 3.25m, unless otherwise stated in the pole schedule on drawing C013
Records - Photos, log, site inspection, ConQA

Detail - The timber poles are to be radiata pine, high density selected in accordance with and complying with NZS 3605:2001 for cross-section, length, straightness, strength and branding. All materials used in the works shall be new unless otherwise specified.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document review
Conformance Criteria - The Engineer shall be provided with a certificate of compliance
Detail - The poles must be H5 treated in accordance with NZS 3640, H5.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document review
Conformance Criteria - The Engineer shall be provided with a certificate of compliance that the poles have all been treated to NZS 3640, H5.

Detail - Poles are to be peeled and not machine shaved and not steam treated. All cut ends, notches or drill holes shall be treated with a liberal brush coat of copper naphthenate or equivalent wood preservative before sealing with a bituminous sealer. Cut ends shall not be in contact with soil.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Engineer to inspect as accordance with specifications
Detail - Concrete mix design(s) shall be submitted to the Engineer in writing prior to placing concrete and approved before placing concrete.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document review
Conformance Criteria - Engineer to approve design prior to commencement
Detail - All concrete delivered to site shall be produced strictly in accordance with the approved mix design
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Concrete Delivery Dockets
Conformance Criteria - Site engineer to inspect delivery dockets
Detail - The concrete used to backfill around the timber poles must have a minimum 28-day compressive strength of 20MPa. Concrete batch crush test supplied by concrete supplier for 28 days.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document review
Records - Test Reports, Lab Testing Register
Detail - Check if the bench the has been excavated/filled can accommodate the entire pile line
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Site engineer to inspect against relevant drawings
Detail - Drilling is to be carried out for every second pole, and poles shall be placed and concreted for at least 24 hours before any drilling for intermediate holes
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - CPS engineer to inspect
Detail - Check drilling performance, verticality and position using equipment of sufficient capacity for the ground conditions.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Site supervisor to inspect
Detail - Timber poles are installed in pre-drilled holes to the dimensions and at the locations and batters shown on the drawings,
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - CPS engineer to inspect, inspect as accordance with specifications
Detail - Inspect pile bore condition, pile depth, rock socket length and toe level
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - CPS engineer to inspect, inspect as accordance with specifications

Detail - The Contractor shall maintain a log describing the type of soil and rock, the ground water level and the general ground conditions encountered in each hole excavation; hole location, reference number, and total depth of hole below ground level.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document review, visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Information shall be provided to the Engineer at the end of each day's work.

Detail - The chosen method of excavation shall minimise overbreak and prevent collapse of ground outside the hole excavation. All loose material is to be removed from the base of the hole before post installation and concreting
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review -  visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Areas of overbreak are to be reinstated in an approved manner
Detail - The contactor must minimise the impact that the drilling has on the environment.All material collected from the drilling process will need to be removed from the site.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document review
Conformance Criteria - All drilling must be in line with the EMP and other environmental protection documents
Records - Monitor, review document with Environmental team
Detail - Check that holes are not to be left open overnight.
Frequency - Close of works each day
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review -  visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Site supervisor to check at close of works each day
Detail - The Contractor shall inform the Engineer for an inspection of the excavation by a suitably qualified geotechnical professional
Frequency - Completion of stage or bore drilling
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Contractor to notify engineer, Geotechnical Engineer to attend and approve excavation
Detail - The hole must be excavated to the tolerances outlined in the specifications
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection
○ Hole plan position at all depths +/- 20mm
○ The pole shall not vary any more than 2 degrees from 20 degrees
Detail - Timber poles shall then be set into the holes, complying with the tolerances outlined in the specifications
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Deviation of pole centre from line in plan +/- 10mm
Detail - Ensure the Permit to Concrete Pump & Pump Operator Checksheet has been completed before concrete pumping commences
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document review
Conformance Criteria - Site Engineer to compete CP and PO checksheets
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - A pre pour inspection checksheet to be completed outlining:
– Pre pour inspection checksheet to be completed
Detail - Concrete dockets checked for correct mix and concrete site testing undertaken. Dockets to the Engineer and keep a record of the volume of concrete placed.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Test Results
Conformance Criteria - NZS 3104 Concrete dockets match design
Detail - The concrete in each hole shall be completed as one continuous operation
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection
Records - Photos, log, site inspection, Document
Detail - Securing of poles in position, then the approved concrete mix shall be poured around the timber pole with concrete being tremmied if required
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection
Records - Photos, log, site inspection, Document
Detail - Check concrete placement method and finish
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection, Document Review
Detail - Survey final position and R.L. of each pile, produce As-Built drawings
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Measurement / Survey
Detail - Ensure all NCRs are closed and included within QA file, Delivery Dockets and Lab Testing Spreadsheet and Test Reports to be included in QA File
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Ensure all QA is uploaded into ConQA / Procore
Records - Delivery Dockets, Test Reports, Lab Testing Register
Detail - Check all piling records are completed and signed by the relevant signatory.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Detail - Red pen mark up drawings to be included in QA file
Frequency - At the completion of the Lot of work
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Drawings
